---
title: "Time In A Bottle"
date: 2020-08-20
weight: 1
---
Rules:

Ordinary sudoku rules apply. This puzzle takes place on a klein bottle. The top and bottom of the grid are glued together--they obey periodic boundary conditions. The left and right side are twisted and then glued together. The circles in the grid represent clocks. The four digits surrounding a white clock must strictly increase in a clockwise fashion starting from any of the four cells. The four digits surrounding a black clock must strictly increase in an anti-clockwise fashion starting from any of the four cells. All possible clocks are marked. (Don't forget that all possible clocks are marked!)
